item.description: Homotopy Type Theory I am currently co-developing The HoTT Game, which is a game in agda for attracting mathematicians to Homotopy Type Theory.

Ax-Grothendieck in Lean My masters project was formalizing the model theoretic proof of Ax-Grothendieck in lean. My repository for the lean code can be found here and my paper and presentation on the subject can both be found here.
Model Theory Notes I have made a lot of notes on model theory which I intend to move directly onto this site. For now, here is the github repository, where everything is in a huge pdf.
